reviews.sentence: Super friendly and responsive. Fabulously friendly and accommodating. Very modern and detail oriented. Huge rooms. Great spa and sauna and outstanding breakfast. Kitchenette is basic and you need to request all items. In room coffee is instant and tea sometimes not replenished minimal supplies. Great free laundry room. Very close to major sites and shops. The only reason I gave less than 5stars is a rare incident when a ceiling grate fell and almost hit baby. We were offered another room but it was very traumatising and detracted from the experience.
opposite Sony Center. good location good service suits well equipedlight criticules just to have space for impovement bright light in spa relax area only liquid soap and fixed shower gel in bathroom.

Best location and comfort. Located at potsdamer platz at the heart of berlin can walk to every attraction. Room was big and comfortable. Used the gym which was very nice. Free wifi. Got very good price using bokingcom. recommended.

Perfect spot. Mandala hotel berlin is situated in a very convenient location near S bahn and U bahn stations. Perfect starting point to explore Berlin. The staff was professional and really helpful. We had the opportunity to use the spa facilities and have lunch in facil restaurant which was an exceptional experience. We will definitely come back.

Best hotel in Berlin. The hotel the staff and spa were all wonderful and the location was perfect. This was one of the best hotels I have ever booked. I would have liked to stay longer and will definitely stay here again on my next trip to Berlin. Everything was perfect. there is nithing I did not like.

This ist the best Hotel in Berlin. This ist the best location in middle of the town. The food is wonderful the service and the staff are very kind. The Spa and the fitnesrom is wonderful. I was a lot of times in Berlin but this time was the best time because of the hotel The Mandala.

My partner and I went there for a full day spa for christmas. The spa itself is ok an small gym saunas and a nice relaxing area which also had the showers in it for after the sauna which makes relaxing difficult. The full day spa included dinner as well. Unfortunately the dinner at the Qiu restaurant was a big disaster which is absolutely unacceptable for a spa day in the mid three digit price range when you want to wind down the day. First there was not table reserved for us and we had to wait close to ten minutes until we got one waited another ten minutes until we received the wine menu and I had to specifically ask for some bread. The mains were completely salty and when we told the waiter he just shoulder shrugged. The deserts which came after 25 minutes were not the one we ordered and when we asked we were told the other is not available. After paying for drinks I went to the reception to complain about the experience where the lady assured me that s not the service they offer wrote down my name told me they revert back and of course has not done it. Its just sad what 5 service means and I hope sharing this experience will improve at least something.

Great Hotel near to all amenities. The Hotel was privately owned and had excellent facilities. The staff were very helpful. No need to have breakfast at there are plenty of local cafes. Centrally located for all amenities. Transport system in walking distance. The hotel has a very nice Spa very expensive but well worth the extravagance. Highly recommend this Hotel to stay. High standard of decor and cleanliness. All amenities close by. Shopping complex. Cafes bars and restaurants. The railway and underground in spitting distance of the hotel. Nothing.
Very nice hotel. Very nice hotel perfect location very efficient and friendly staff breakfast is awesome and the spa very peaceful.

Amazing staff amazing location. First time to Berlin have fallen in love with the hotel and Berlin. I booked our stay for myself originally I then booked my sister and her daughter a flight. Arrived at the hotel the staff added them to our room free of charge. They brought up extra blankets and spa robes No problems whatsoeverAl staff were friendly and helpful. The spa is amazing calm and clean. Perfect way to spend the evening or morning. can not rate the location enough right next to everything you would need backs on to a mall restraunts and coffee shops. The trains which are SO easy to use are 1 minute away they go everywhere we never used a cab. Apart from the one to the airport which the hotel booked so we could spend more time in the spa that morning. we will be back I could not imagine staying anywhere else.

Perfect central location for a short stay in Berlin walking to all sites shops and facilities. Location location and super nice modern hotel. Shame the spa was under refurbishment but access to spa at Hyat around the corner was actually fab.

Beautiful hotel centrally located. Very friendly helpful staff. Our suite was gorgeous spacious light and airy with plenty of room for 4 2 adults and 2 children. The gym was well equipped except for the absence of weights less than 8kg. LOL. It is also still being developed but we were allowed use of the pool and sauna in the Hyat next door. Overall we loved our stay and would highly recommend.

Berlin. Wonderful hotel amazing breakfast kind staff everything was great. The new spa is nice but i should change a sauna for a little pool or jacuzi. Location is perfect busses outside and subway just 3 minutes from the hotel.

Great location. Friendly and helpful staff. Would definitely stay again and would recommend highly. The bed and pillows were really comfortable. The set up in the room was also comfortable and had everything that we needed. The bedroom was tidied each day and the small touches around the room was thoughtful. The air conditioning was tricky to use. It would have been helpful to have a guide booklet in the room outlining breakfast spa facilities etc. Not everything was explained very well.

Comfortable hotel in the downtown. The hotel is located close the Philharmonic Sony Center Brandenburg Gate ect. Easy to come by public transportion. Personal was very polite and helpful. Room was spacious elegant and clean. Breakfast was good. But SPA did not have a pool were to swim. We were accommodated a studio room which have cokin plate but not any household supplies if yuo wish make food yourself.

3star hotel in a corporate setting. the room are spacious but feels more like 3star hotelas a 5star hotel guest are charged an entrance fee of 10 Euros to use the spa and gym facilities. rooms are dated and very bright lights in coridorsno essential amenities in the room for example tooth brush.
Exceptional. Very spacious room good location and beautifully designed. Had to wait for an hour for one person to finish before i can use the gym.

beatiful and amazing hotel but poor service at the spa. I was on a business trip of 48hrs in Berlin and away from my baby. I had exactly 2hours for me and booked this hotel specifically to use the spa. it only opens at 11 most saunas did not work yet and particularly the womens only area. I ended up in the only turned on hamam with a dude that did not think it was necessary to cover up. very uncomfortable. the special dome was only turned on when I got into the room so it was basically not effective the first 15min. i was very disappointed and felt i really wasted my time and money. relaxation 0.

Good hotel. Watch out for additional fee for spa. Large comfortable suite nice spa friendly staff good location. There was an additional fee for using the spa 10 EUR per person per day which was not made clear when booking. Even though we booked treatments massages for 90 EUR each we were charged the 10 EUR for entry to the spa. I challenged this and was told that it was correct and would not be waived.

Great location good rooms. Loved this hotel located right next to the Potsdamer Platz station. Rooms had a lot of space see pictures staff was friendly however. I overslept and missed my spa appointment but no one called me and there was a curly hair on the phone. Could n’t tell if it was a hair that came from the nether regions. Other than that excellent hotel thus the 4 stars. I ’d stay at the place again.

We expected more. This is the third time we stay at the Mandala hotel over the last 7 years and unfortunately is it not as good as it used to be. We had high expectations which only partly where met. ONO Spa Absolutely fantastic. Facil Restaurant We only had breakfast there but it was a delight as usually. My compliment to the managers who set the top standard. Best hotel breakfast in BerlinQIU Bar Has potential but when one of the staff continuously cough in his hand and continues to mix drinks did I lose my appetite of the drink. The staff continuously needed to check drink recipe of standard drinks is n’t there a designated trained bartender. This should be better in a 5 Hotel as MandalaRoms Large nice rooms with a small Pantry kitchenette. The cleaning was ok but not more. We ordered bath salt from the iPad but after an hour we got a bottle of water instead. The major incident was when our kid found 2pack condoms in his bed obviously lost by the cleaning staff. This should not happen in a 5 Hotel as MandalaCheckout. We had to review the bill together with the staff as there where several items we had not ordered on the bill of about 40 € in total. It was instantly removed but it should not have happened in a 5 Hotel as Mandala in the first place. So to summarize the Mandala is still one of the best hotels in Berlin but they clearly got several items to work on and out next Berlin trip will probably be to another 5 hotel.
